segments.text: How do I make a good impression in the interview ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should try to put your best foot forward , and be careful of your personal appearance . At least you should get yourself dressed up . Appearance isnt everything , but it's the first thing an interviewer notices about you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t boast and don ’ t be modest .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you mean by this ? You can ’ t do the two things at the same time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Appear confident and show the interviewers that you ’ re competent . Don ’ t exaggerate things or you'll give the impression that you ’ re talking big .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Try to be natural , alert and interested .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ Ve given me very valuable advice and I have more confidence in myself now . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My pleasure . Good luck to you .
segments.speaker: S2
